pkgmetadata.longdescription: Evaluation of Diversity in Nucleotide Libraries // Evaluation of diversity in peptide libraries, including NNN, NNB, NNK/S, and 20/20 schemes. Custom encoding schemes can also be defined. Metrics for evaluation include expected coverage, relative efficiency, and the functional diversity of the library. Peptide-level inclusion probabilities are computable for both the native and custom encoding schemes.
